title: [Health] New study shines a light on men's unconscious attraction to fertility cues in women's faces

[Medicine] Viruses discovered as a potential new therapy option for eczema (atopic dermatitis) - bacteriophages, which colonize the skin as viral components of the microbiome, can be an innovative atopic dermatitis therapy, for example, by identifying and culturing phages specialized for Staphylococcus aureus
